1.title: Morning remembrance
1.arabic: اللّهُـمَّ أَنْتَ رَبِّـي لا إلهَ إلاّ أَنْتَ
1.transliteration: Allahumma anta rabbi la ilaha illa anta
1.translation: O Allah, You are my Lord, none has the right to be worshipped except You.

2.title: Morning protection
2.arabic: بِسْمِ اللهِ الَّذِي لا يَضُرُّ مَعَ اسْمِهِ شَيْءٌ
2.translation: In the name of Allah, with whose name nothing can harm.

3.title: Gratitude in morning
3.arabic: اللّهُـمَّ ما أَصْبَـحَ بي مِنْ نِعْـمَة
3.transliteration: Allahumma ma asbaha bi min ni'mah
3.translation: O Allah, whatever blessing I wake with is from You.

4.title: Evening remembrance
4.translation: We have reached the evening and the dominion belongs to Allah.

5.title: Evening protection
5.translation: O Allah, I bear witness this evening that You are Allah.
